title: Riki Matsuda
text:
is a Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er who plays as a <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> for <a href="Cerezo%20Osaka">Cerezo Osaka</a> in the <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a>.
Career.
Nagoya Grampus.
Matsuda made his official debut for <a href="Oita%20Trinita">Oita Trinita</a> in the <a href="J.%20League%20Division%201">J. League Division 1</a> on 22 May 2013 against <a href="Sagan%20Tosu">Sagan Tosu</a> in <a href="Best%20Amenity%20Stadium">Best Amenity Stadium</a> in <a href="Tosu%2C%20Saga">Tosu</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. He played the full match in where his team lost 2-3.
Personal life.
His father is Indonesian and his mother is Japanese.
His twin brother <a href="Riku%20Matsuda%20%28footballer%2C%20born%201991%29">Riku</a> is also a soccer player, and is a full-back of <a href="Cerezo%20Osaka">Cerezo Osaka</a>.
Club statistics.
"Updated to end of 2018 season".
